data.details:
Calling all Program Aides - you are invited to a PA Kick Off!!

This training is open to all Cadette, Seniors and Ambassadors who have previously completed Program Aide training.

Connect with other Program Aides from around our Council, share your experiences and gather new ideas for events and programs. Learn about specialized PA training for our Astronomy program and check out upcoming opportunities to put your leadership skills to use. Weather permitting, weâ€™ll have time to swim after lunch so bring your towel and swimsuit!

Cost per girl is $10.00 and includes swimming, a PA t-shirt, lunch and supplies. Please have your t-shirt size ready when you register.

Cost per adult is $5 and includes a Silver/Gold Award primer, lunch and pool time.

*Chaperones are not required for this event, adults who are not registered are welcome to stay but will not be included in lunch or swim time.  This event is not open to Tag-a-longs.
